name: PiraCrash!
description:
Unique fun duel for everyone

PREPARE THE CANNONS!


Highly Competitive

Perfect for a party.


Create your strategy to sink your opponent!

Awesome for you and for your friends!


Master all the possibilities!

Shoot, drop some bombs and get awesome Power-Ups!


E-Sport or Casual Game?

Are you a sailor or a captain?


Game Features



  • Single Player Mode
  • Local Player VS. Player Mode
  • Custom Mode
  • Hardcore Mode
  • Gravity Mode
  • Drift (Oh yeah!)
  • Rubber Duck
  • Awesome Power-Ups!

Join our Crew, mate!
